name: Shades (SSDev01)
description:
"It is time for an incredibly indie arena fps to appear out of nowhere and become monstrously successful"

     ~lots of people, lots of them, hopefully

  Welcome to Shades, an online multiplayer FPS Arena Shooter currently in development, but also kind of usable enough for people to try it out... Featuring 20 named characters to grow unusually attached to, fast paced FPS action, powerups, hitscan weapons, DOUBLE JUMP!, matchmaking, private party rooms with join codes, and more!

Jump in today and bring some friends along for the ride.

Shades is currently in ALPHA. It's very early on, but I think worth sharing with the world. Expect some rough edges and hopefully lots of updates.

Questions? Feel free to post in the comments, but the easiest form of communication would likely be the community Discord Server (below).

We have a community Discord Server!! - https://discord.gg/K5XbgXHVw7

Join for updates, community chat, and a place to look for players and share party room join codes, and more.

Shades is a modern take on the Arena Shooter genre, existing mostly as a party game at the moment. Shades is currently in development by Sean Sonntag.
